tasks.label: ğŸ“‹ Installation Guide
tasks.command:
echo '
ğŸ“¥ Installation Guide for Missing Tools

ğŸ PYTHON:
   â€¢ macOS: brew install python3 OR download from python.org
   â€¢ Linux: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip (Ubuntu/Debian)
           sudo yum install python3 python3-pip (RHEL/CentOS)
   â€¢ Windows: Download from python.org or use Microsoft Store

ğŸ“˜ NODE.JS & NPM:
   â€¢ macOS: brew install node OR download from nodejs.org
   â€¢ Linux: sudo apt install nodejs npm (Ubuntu/Debian)
           sudo yum install nodejs npm (RHEL/CentOS)
   â€¢ Windows: Download from nodejs.org or use winget install nodejs

â˜• JAVA:
   â€¢ macOS: brew install openjdk OR download from oracle.com
   â€¢ Linux: sudo apt install default-jdk (Ubuntu/Debian)
           sudo yum install java-11-openjdk-devel (RHEL/CentOS)
   â€¢ Windows: Download from oracle.com or use winget install ojdkbuild.openjdk

ğŸ¹ GO (Optional):
   â€¢ All OS: Download from golang.org
   â€¢ macOS: brew install go
   â€¢ Linux: Package managers vary by distro
   â€¢ Windows: winget install GoLang.Go

ğŸ¦€ RUST (Optional):
   â€¢ All OS: curl --proto =https --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh
   â€¢ Or visit rustup.rs for GUI installers'
tasks.detail: Cross-platform installation instructions for all required tools
